= API =
BiVeS provides a sophisticated API, see source:src/main/java/de/unirostock/sems/bives/api 

== API for Comparison of two Documents ==

* super class (abstract): source:src/main/java/de/unirostock/sems/bives/api/Diff.java ([http://jdoc.sems.uni-rostock.de/BiVeS-Core/de/unirostock/sems/bives/api/Diff.html JavaDoc])
 * compare two XML files: source:src/main/java/de/unirostock/sems/bives/api/RegularDiff.java ([http://jdoc.sems.uni-rostock.de/BiVeS-Core/de/unirostock/sems/bives/api/RegularDiff.html JavaDoc])
 * bives-cellml:wiki also provides specialized API two compare two CellML files:  ([http://jdoc.sems.uni-rostock.de/BiVeS-CellML/de/unirostock/sems/bives/cellml/api/CellMLDiff.html JavaDoc])
 * bives-sbml:wiki also provides specialized API two compare two SBML files:  ([http://jdoc.sems.uni-rostock.de/BiVeS-SBML/de/unirostock/sems/bives/sbml/api/SBMLDiff.html JavaDoc])
